quote_last: I have a solution, via the local paper. A girl from the village will collect it, iron it all overnight at Â£3 a shirt, and sew on Eddie's button.
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_first: I squinted down the street at the bank clock:
quote_last: , 87 degrees. "It's only a block and a half and it's not that hot, Daddy. The walk will do you good." This conversation made me breathless, as if I were wearing a girdle with tight stays.
title: A Thousand Acres
author: Jane Smiley
